-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c4)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c5)
-| diffsc(s0, c3)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c4)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c5)
-| diffsc(s1, c3)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c4)
-| diffsc(s2, c1)
-| diffsc(s2, c5)
-| diffsc(s2, c3)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c3, c0))), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cop(c0, c1), wsbc(s2, c3, w1))), emptycls))

comment: Value of an operation given by a maps-to rule, where the first argument is a pair and the base set of the second argument is the first component of the first argument, deduction version. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Oct-2017.)
